summary: An ordinance amending Sections 18 and 19 of Ordinance No. 16370, entitled: "An ordinance relating to the municipal light and power plant of the City of Seattle, regulating the use of electric current therefrom, providing for the sale of such electric current, fixing the price thereof and providing a method for collecting rates therefor, and providing penalties for violation of this ordinance", and repealing all ordinances or parts of ordinances in conflict herewith.
